00019 /* When appropriate, alloca is cleaner than malloc/free.  The storage
00020  * is freed automatically on return from a function. When using gcc the
00021  * builtin version is much faster. */
00022 #ifdef __GNUC__
00023 # undef alloca
00024 # define alloca(x) __builtin_alloca((x))
00025 #else
00026 /* this is necessary (and sufficient) for Solaris 10: */
00027 # ifdef __sun
00028 #  include <alloca.h>
00029 # endif
00030 #endif
00031 
00033 #define Alloca(n, t)   (t *) alloca( (size_t) ( (n) * sizeof(t) ) )

00036 #define AZERO(x, n) {int _I_, _SZ_ = (n); for(_I_ = 0; _I_ < _SZ_; _I_++) (x)[_I_] = 0;}

00079 static R_INLINE double sqr_length(const double *x, int n)
00080 {
00081     double ans = 0;
00082     int i;
00083 
00084     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) ans += x[i] * x[i];
00085     return ans;
00086 }

00100 static R_INLINE double*
00101 apply_perm(double *dest, const double *src, const int *perm, int n)
00102 {
00103     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) dest[i] = src[perm ? perm[i] : i];
00104     return dest;
00105 }
00106 
00119 static R_INLINE double*
00120 apply_iperm(double *dest, const double *src, const int *perm, int n)
00121 {
00122     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) dest[perm ? perm[i] : i] = src[i];
00123     return dest;
00124 }

00134 static R_INLINE int Gp_grp(int ind, int nf, const int *Gp)
00135 {
00136     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) if (ind < Gp[i + 1]) return i;
00137     error(_("invalid row index %d (max is %d)"), ind, Gp[nf]);
00138     return -1;                  /* -Wall */
00139 }

00152 static R_INLINE double *SLOT_REAL_NULL(SEXP obj, SEXP nm)
00153 {
00154     SEXP pt = GET_SLOT(obj, nm);
00155     return LENGTH(pt) ? REAL(pt) : (double*) NULL;
00156 }

00166 static R_INLINE double
00167 get_sigma(int REML, const int* dims, const double* d)
00168 {
00169     return (dims[useSc_POS] ? 
00170             sqrt(d[pwrss_POS] / (dims[n_POS] -
00171                             (REML ? dims[p_POS] : 0))) : 1);
00172 }
00173 
00187 static int                      /* populate the st, nc and nlev arrays */
00188 ST_nc_nlev(const SEXP ST, const int *Gp, double **st, int *nc, int *nlev)
00189 {
00190     int ans = 0, i, nf = LENGTH(ST);
00191 
00192     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00193         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i);
00194         int nci = *INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol));
00195 
00196         if (nci > ans) ans = nci;
00197         if (st) st[i] = REAL(STi);
00198         nc[i] = nci;
00199         nlev[i] = (Gp[i + 1] - Gp[i])/nci;
00200     }
00201     return ans;
00202 }
00203 
00218 static int
00219 C_nz_col(int *nz, int j, int nf, const int *Gp, const int *nc,
00220        const int *nlev, const int *zi, const int *zp)
00221 {
00222     int ans, i, p;
00223 
00224     AZERO(nz, Gp[nf]);
00225     for (p = zp[j]; p < zp[j + 1]; p++) {
00226         int zrow = zi[p];
00227         int k = Gp_grp(zrow, nf, Gp);
00228 
00229         nz[zrow] = 1;           /* T contains the identity */
00230         if (nc[k] > 1) {
00231             int nextra = (zrow - Gp[k]) / nlev[k];
00232             for (i = 1; i <= nextra; i++)
00233                 nz[zrow - i * nlev[k]] = 1;
00234         }
00235     }
00236     for (i = 0, ans = 0; i < Gp[nf]; i++) if (nz[i]) ans++;
00237     return ans;
00238 }

00249 static void update_ranef(SEXP x)
00250 {
00251     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
00252     int *Gp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym)),
00253         *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym)),
00254         i, i1 = 1, k, nf = LENGTH(ST),
00255         p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
00256     double *b = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ranefSym)),
00257         *u = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uSym)), one = 1;
00258     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00259     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00260     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
00261     R_CheckStack(); 
00262 
00263     if (!SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtXWtSym)) { /* LMM */
00264         double *rx = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RXySym)),
00265             *rzx = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RCXySym)),
00266             *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
00267             *fixef = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym)),
00268             mone = -1, one = 1;
00269         CHM_DN cu = N_AS_CHM_DN(u, q, 1), sol;
00270         R_CheckStack();
00271                                 /* solve RX beta-hat = del2 */
00272         F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "N", "N", &p, rx, &p, fixef, &i1);
00273         F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &q, &p, &mone, rzx, &q,
00274                         fixef, &i1, &one, u, &i1);
00275         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, cu, &c)))
00276             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_Lt) failed:"));
00277         Memcpy(u, (double*)(sol->x), q);
00278         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
00279         d[usqr_POS] = sqr_length(u, q);
00280         d[disc_POS] = d[pwrss_POS] - d[usqr_POS];
00281     }
00282     ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00283                                 /* inverse permutation */
00284     for (i = 0; i < q; i++) b[((int*)L->Perm)[i]] = u[i];
00285     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00286         for (k = 0; k < nc[i]; k++) { /* multiply by \tilde{S}_i */
00287             double dd = st[i][k * (nc[i] + 1)];
00288             int base = Gp[i] + k * nlev[i], kk;
00289             for (kk = 0; kk < nlev[i]; kk++) b[base + kk] *= dd;
00290         }
00291         if (nc[i] > 1) {        /* multiply by \tilde{T}_i */
00292             F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "T", "U", nlev + i, nc + i, &one,
00293                             st[i], nc + i, b + Gp[i], nlev + i);
00294         }
00295     }
00296 }
00297 
00307 SEXP mer_ST_initialize(SEXP ST, SEXP Gpp, SEXP Zt)
00308 {
00309     int *Gp = INTEGER(Gpp),
00310         *Zdims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_DimSym)),
00311         *zi = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_iSym)),
00312         i, j, k, nf = LENGTH(ST);
00313     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int),
00314         nnz = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_pSym))[Zdims[1]];
00315     double *rowsqr = Alloca(Zdims[0], double),
00316         **st = Alloca(nf, double*),
00317         *zx = REAL(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_xSym));
00318     R_CheckStack();
00319     
00320     ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00321     AZERO(rowsqr, Zdims[0]);
00322     for (i = 0; i < nnz; i++) rowsqr[zi[i]] += zx[i] * zx[i];
00323     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00324         AZERO(st[i], nc[i] * nc[i]);
00325         for (j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++) {
00326             double *stij = st[i] + j * (nc[i] + 1);
00327             for (k = 0; k < nlev[i]; k++)
00328                 *stij += rowsqr[Gp[i] + j * nlev[i] + k];
00329             *stij = sqrt(nlev[i]/(0.375 * *stij));
00330         }
00331     }
00332     return R_NilValue;
00333 }
00334 
00343 static double *ST_getPars(SEXP x, double *pars)
00344 {
00345     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
00346     int i, nf = LENGTH(ST), pos = 0;
00347     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00348         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i);
00349         double *st = REAL(STi);
00350         int nci = INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol))[0];
00351         int j, k, ncp1 = nci + 1;
00352 
00353         for (j = 0; j < nci; j++)
00354             pars[pos++] = st[j * ncp1];
00355         for (j = 0; j < (nci - 1); j++)
00356             for (k = j + 1; k < nci; k++)
00357                 pars[pos++] = st[k + j * nci];
00358     }
00359     return pars;
00360 }

00369 SEXP mer_ST_getPars(SEXP x)
00370 {
00371     SEXP ans =
00372         PROTECT(allocVector(REALSXP, 
00373                             INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym))[np_POS]));
00374     ST_getPars(x, REAL(ans));
00375     UNPROTECT(1); 
00376     return ans;
00377 }

00386 static void
00387 ST_setPars(SEXP x, const double *pars)
00388 {
00389     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
00390     int *Gp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym));
00391     CHM_SP cC = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ASym)),
00392         cZt = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ZtSym));
00393     int *vi = (int*)(cC->i), *vp = (int*)(cC->p),
00394         *zi = (int*)(cZt->i), *zp = (int*)(cZt->p),
00395         i, j, ncmax, nf = LENGTH(ST), p, pos = 0;
00396     int vnnz = vp[cC->ncol], znnz = zp[cZt->ncol];
00397     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00398     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*),
00399         *vx = (double*)(cC->x), *zx = (double*)(cZt->x),
00400         one[] = {1,0};
00401     R_CheckStack();
00402 
00403     ncmax = ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00404                                 /* install the parameters in the ST slot */
00405     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00406         int j, k, nci = nc[i], ncp1 = nc[i] + 1;
00407         double *sti = st[i];
00408 
00409         for (j = 0; j < nci; j++)
00410             sti[j * ncp1] = pars[pos++];
00411         for (j = 0; j < (nci - 1); j++)
00412             for (k = j + 1; k < nci; k++)
00413                 sti[k + j * nci] = pars[pos++];
00414     }
00415                                 /* Copy Z' to V' unless V' has nonzero
00416                                  * positions not in Z' */ 
00417     if (vnnz == znnz) Memcpy(vx, zx, znnz); 
00418     else { /* Only occurs in nonlinear models with correlated random effects */
00419         AZERO(vx, vnnz);        /* Initialize the potential nonzeros to 0 */
00420         for (j = 0; j < cC->ncol; j++) { /* Iterate over columns */
00421             int pv = vp[j];
00422             for (p = zp[j]; p < zp[j + 1]; p++) { /* nonzeros in Z' */
00423                 while (vi[pv] < zi[p]) pv++;      /* matching pos in V' */
00424                 if (vi[pv] != zi[p])
00425                     error(_("nonconforming Zt and C structures, j = %d"), j);
00426                 vx[pv] = zx[p];
00427             }
00428         }
00429     }
00430                                 /* When T != I multiply C on the left by T' */
00431     if (ncmax > 1)              /* T' == I when ncmax == 1 */
00432         for (j = 0; j < cC->ncol; j++) /* multiply column j by T' */
00433             for (p = vp[j]; p < vp[j + 1];) {
00434                 int i = Gp_grp(vi[p], nf, Gp);
00435 
00436                 if (nc[i] <= 1) p++;
00437                 else {
00438                     int nr = p; /* number of rows in `B' in dtrmm call */
00439                     while ((vi[nr] - Gp[i]) < nlev[i]) nr++;
00440                     nr -= p;    /* nr == 1 except in models with carry-over */
00441                     F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "N", "U", &nr, nc + i,
00442                                     one, st[i], nc + i, vx + p, &nr);
00443                     p += (nr * nc[i]);
00444                 }
00445             }
00446                                 /* Multiply C on the left by S */
00447     for (p = 0; p < vnnz; p++) {
00448         int i = Gp_grp(vi[p], nf, Gp);
00449         vx[p] *= st[i][((vi[p] - Gp[i]) / nlev[i]) * (nc[i] + 1)];
00450     }
00451 }

00462 SEXP mer_ST_setPars(SEXP x, SEXP pars)
00463 {
00464     int npar = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym))[np_POS];
00465 
00466     if (!isReal(pars) || LENGTH(pars) != npar)
00467         error(_("pars must be a real vector of length %d"), npar);
00468     ST_setPars(x, REAL(pars));
00469     return R_NilValue;
00470 }

00480 SEXP mer_sigma(SEXP x, SEXP which)
00481 {
00482     int w = asInteger(which),
00483         *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00484                 
00485     return ScalarReal(get_sigma(w < 0 || (!w && dims[isREML_POS]), dims,
00486                                 REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym))));
00487 }
00488 
00496 SEXP mer_postVar(SEXP x)
00497 {
00498     int *Gp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym)),
00499         *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00500     int nf = dims[nf_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
00501     SEXP ans = PROTECT(allocVector(VECSXP, nf));
00502     int i, j, k;
00503     double *vv, one[] = {1,0}, sc;
00504     CHM_SP sm1, sm2;
00505     CHM_DN dm1;
00506     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00507     int *Perm = (int*)(L->Perm), *iperm = Alloca(q, int),
00508         *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00509     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
00510     R_CheckStack();
00511 
00512     ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00513     for (j = 0; j < q; j++) iperm[Perm[j]] = j; /* inverse permutation */
00514     sc = get_sigma(dims[isREML_POS], dims, REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)));
00515     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00516         int ncisqr = nc[i] * nc[i];
00517         CHM_SP rhs = M_cholmod_allocate_sparse(q, nc[i], nc[i],
00518                                                1/*sorted*/, 1/*packed*/,
00519                                                0/*stype*/, CHOLMOD_REAL, &c);
00520 
00521         SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, i, alloc3DArray(REALSXP, nc[i], nc[i], nlev[i]));
00522         vv = REAL(VECTOR_ELT(ans, i));
00523         for (j = 0; j <= nc[i]; j++) ((int *)(rhs->p))[j] = j;
00524         for (j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++)
00525             ((double *)(rhs->x))[j] = st[i][j * (nc[i] + 1)] * sc;
00526         for (k = 0; k < nlev[i]; k++) {
00527             double *vvk = vv + k * ncisqr;
00528             for (j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++)
00529                 ((int*)(rhs->i))[j] = iperm[Gp[i] + k + j * nlev[i]];
00530             sm1 = M_cholmod_spsolve(CHOLMOD_L, L, rhs, &c);
00531             sm2 = M_cholmod_transpose(sm1, 1 /*values*/, &c);
00532             M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm1, &c);
00533             sm1 = M_cholmod_aat(sm2, (int*)NULL, (size_t)0, 1 /*mode*/, &c);
00534             dm1 = M_cholmod_sparse_to_dense(sm1, &c);
00535             M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm1, &c); M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm2, &c);
00536             Memcpy(vvk, (double*)(dm1->x), ncisqr);
00537             M_cholmod_free_dense(&dm1, &c);
00538             if (nc[i] > 1) {
00539                 F77_CALL(dtrmm)("L", "L", "N", "U", nc + i, nc + i,
00540                                 one, st[i], nc + i, vvk, nc + i);
00541                 F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "T", "U", nc + i, nc + i,
00542                                 one, st[i], nc + i, vvk, nc + i);
00543             }
00544         }
00545         M_cholmod_free_sparse(&rhs, &c);
00546     }
00547     UNPROTECT(1);
00548     return ans;
00549 }

00555     double *ax, *tx;
00556     CHM_TR T;

00574         }
00575     }

00577     M_cholmod_free_triplet(&T, &c);
00578     return AA;

00590 SEXP mer_create_L(SEXP CmP)
00591 {
00592     double one[] = {1, 0};
00593     CHM_SP Cm = AS_CHM_SP(CmP);
00594     CHM_FR L;
00595     R_CheckStack();
00596 
00597     L = M_cholmod_analyze(Cm, &c);
00598     if (!M_cholmod_factorize_p(Cm, one, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, L, &c))
00599         error(_("cholmod_factorize_p failed: status %d, minor %d from ncol %d"),
00600               c.status, L->minor, L->n);
00601 
00602     return M_chm_factor_to_SEXP(L, 1);
00603 }

00608 static const double LTHRESH = 30.;
00609 static const double MLTHRESH = -30.;

00614 
00624 static double update_mu(SEXP x)
00625 {
00626     SEXP v = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym);
00627     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00628     int i, i1 = 1, n = dims[n_POS], p = dims[p_POS], s = dims[s_POS];
00629     int ns = n * s;
00630     double *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
00631         *eta = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_etaSym)),
00632         *mu = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muSym)),
00633         *muEta = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_muEtaSym),
00634         *offset = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_offsetSym),
00635         *srwt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtrWtSym),
00636         *res = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_residSym)),
00637         *var = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_varSym),
00638         *y = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym)),
00639         one[] = {1,0};
00640     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00641     CHM_SP cC = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ASym));
00642     CHM_DN Ptu, ceta = N_AS_CHM_DN(eta, ns, 1),
00643         cu = AS_CHM_DN(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uSym));
00644     R_CheckStack();
00645 
00646                                 /* eta := offset or eta := 0 */
00647     for (i = 0; i < ns; i++) eta[i] = offset ? offset[i] : 0;
00648                                 /* eta := eta + X \beta */
00649     F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &ns, &p, one,
00650                     REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_XSym)), &ns,
00651                     REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym)), &i1,
00652                     one, eta, &i1);
00653                                 /* eta := eta + C' P' u */
00654     Ptu = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Pt, L, cu, &c);
00655     if (!M_cholmod_sdmult(cC, 1 /* trans */, one, one, Ptu, ceta, &c))
00656         error(_("cholmod_sdmult error returned"));
00657     M_cholmod_free_dense(&Ptu, &c);
00658 
00659     if (LENGTH(v)) {            /* evaluate the nonlinear model */
00660         SEXP rho = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_envSym);
00661         SEXP gg, pnames = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_pnamesSym), vv;
00662         int *gdims, s = dims[s_POS];
00663         
00664         for (i = 0; i < s; i++) { /* par. vals. into env. */
00665             vv = findVarInFrame(rho,
00666                                 install(CHAR(STRING_ELT(pnames, i))));
00667             if (!isReal(vv) || LENGTH(vv) != n)
00668                 error(_("Parameter %s in the environment must be a length %d numeric vector"),
00669                       CHAR(STRING_ELT(pnames, i)), n);
00670             Memcpy(REAL(vv), eta + i * n, n);
00671         }
00672         vv = PROTECT(eval(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_nlmodelSym), rho));
00673         if (!isReal(vv) || LENGTH(vv) != n)
00674             error(_("evaluated model is not a numeric vector of length %d"), n);
00675         gg = getAttrib(vv, lme4_gradientSym);
00676         if (!isReal(gg) || !isMatrix(gg))
00677             error(_("gradient attribute of evaluated model must be a numeric matrix"));
00678         gdims = INTEGER(getAttrib(gg, R_DimSymbol));
00679         if (gdims[0] != n ||gdims[1] != s)
00680             error(_("gradient matrix must be of size %d by %d"), n, s);
00681                                 /* colnames of the gradient
00682                                  * corresponding to the order of the
00683                                  * pnames has been checked */
00684         SET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym, vv);
00685         UNPROTECT(1);
00686         eta = REAL(vv);
00687     }
00688                                 /* eta now points to an n vector  */
00689     if (muEta) {        /* apply the generalized linear part */
00690         switch(dims[fTyp_POS]) {
00691         case 1:                 /* binomial with logit link */
00692             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00693                 double etai = eta[i];
00694                 double tmp = (etai < MLTHRESH) ? DOUBLE_EPS :
00695                     ((etai > LTHRESH) ? INVEPS : exp(etai));
00696                 mu[i] = tmp/(1 + tmp);
00697                 muEta[i] = var[i] = mu[i] * (1 - mu[i]);
00698             }
00699             break;
00700         case 2:                 /* binomial with probit link */
00701             if (!MPTHRESH) {
00702                 MPTHRESH = qnorm5(DOUBLE_EPS, 0, 1, 1, 0);
00703                 PTHRESH = -MPTHRESH;
00704             }
00705             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00706                 double etai = eta[i], tmp;
00707                 mu[i] = (etai < MPTHRESH) ? DOUBLE_EPS :
00708                     ((etai > PTHRESH) ? 1 - DOUBLE_EPS :
00709                      pnorm5(etai, 0, 1, 1, 0));
00710                 var[i] = mu[i] * (1 - mu[i]);
00711                 tmp = dnorm4(eta[i], 0, 1, 0);
00712                 muEta[i] =
00713                     (tmp < DOUBLE_EPS) ? DOUBLE_EPS : tmp;
00714             }
00715             break;
00716         case 3:                 /* Poisson with log link */
00717             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00718                 double tmp = exp(eta[i]);
00719                 muEta[i] = var[i] = mu[i] =
00720                     (tmp < DOUBLE_EPS) ? DOUBLE_EPS : tmp;
00721             }
00722             break;
00723         default:
00724             error(_("General form of glmer_linkinv not yet written"));
00725         } 
00726     } else {
00727         Memcpy(mu, eta, n);
00728     }
00729 
00730     d[wrss_POS] = 0;            /* update resid slot and d[wrss_POS] */
00731     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00732         res[i] = (y[i] - mu[i]) * (srwt ? srwt[i] : 1);
00733         d[wrss_POS] += res[i] * res[i];
00734     }
00735                                 /* store u'u */
00736     d[usqr_POS] = sqr_length((double*)(cu->x), dims[q_POS]);
00737     return (d[pwrss_POS] = d[usqr_POS] + d[wrss_POS]);
00738 }
00739 
00750 SEXP mer_update_mu(SEXP x)
00751 {
00752     return ScalarReal(update_mu(x));
00753 }
00754 
00765 static double update_L(SEXP x)
00766 {
00767     SEXP vP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym);
00768     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00769     int lv = LENGTH(vP), n = dims[n_POS], s = dims[s_POS];
00770     double
00771         *cx = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_CxSym),
00772         *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
00773         *res = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_residSym)),
00774         *mu = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muSym)),
00775         *muEta = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_muEtaSym),
00776         *sXwt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtXWtSym),
00777         *srwt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtrWtSym),
00778         *var =  SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_varSym),
00779         *y = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym)),
00780         one[] = {1,0};
00781     CHM_SP A = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ASym));
00782     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00783     R_CheckStack();
00784     
00785     if (var) {              /* Update srwt and res. Reevaluate wrss. */
00786         double *pwt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_priorWtSym);
00787         
00788         d[wrss_POS] = 0;
00789         for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
00790             srwt[j] = sqrt((pwt ? pwt[j] : 1) / var[j]);
00791             res[j] = srwt[j] * (y[j] - mu[j]);
00792             d[wrss_POS] += res[j] * res[j];
00793         }
00794     }
00795     if (sXwt) {                 /* Update sXwt and C */
00796         int *ai = (int*)A->i, *ap = (int*)A->p, i, j;
00797         double *ax = (double*)(A->x), *grad = (double*) NULL;
00798         CHM_SP C = A;
00799 
00800         if (lv) grad = REAL(getAttrib(vP, lme4_gradientSym));
00801         for (j = 0; j < s; j++) {
00802             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00803                 int ja = i + j * n;
00804                 sXwt[ja] = (srwt ? srwt[i] : 1) *
00805                     (muEta ? muEta[i] : 1) *
00806                     (grad ? grad[ja] : 1);
00807             }
00808         }
00809         if (s == 1) {           /* C is a scaled version of A */
00810             for (j = 0; j < n; j++)
00811                 for (int p = ap[j]; p < ap[j + 1]; p++)
00812                     cx[p] = ax[p] * sXwt[j];
00813             A->x = (void*)cx;
00814         } else {
00815             int *ci, *cp, pa, pc;
00816             C = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_CmSym));
00817             R_CheckStack();
00818 
00819             ci = (int*)C->i; cp = (int*)C->p; cx = (double*)C->x;
00820             for (j = 0; j < s; j++)
00821                 for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00822                     int ja = i + j * n;
00823                     for (pa = ap[ja]; pa < ap[ja + 1]; pa++) {
00824                         for (pc = cp[i]; pc < cp[i + 1]; pc++)
00825                             if (ci[pc] == ai[pa]) break;
00826                         if (pc >= cp[i + 1])
00827                             error(_("Structure of Cm and A are not consistent"));
00828                         cx[pc] += ax[pa] * sXwt[ja];
00829                     }
00830                 }
00831             A = C;
00832         }
00833     }
00834 
00835     if (!M_cholmod_factorize_p(A, one, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, L, &c))
00836         error(_("cholmod_factorize_p failed: status %d, minor %d from ncol %d"),
00837               c.status, L->minor, L->n);
00838 
00839     d[ldL2_POS] = 0;            /* evaluate log(det(L))^2 */
00840     if (L->is_super) {
00841         int i;
00842         for (i = 0; i < L->nsuper; i++) {
00843             int j, nrp1 = 1 + ((int *)(L->pi))[i + 1] - ((int *)(L->pi))[i],
00844                 nc = ((int *)(L->super))[i + 1] - ((int *)(L->super))[i];
00845             double *x = (double *)(L->x) + ((int *)(L->px))[i];
00846 
00847             for (j = 0; j < nc; j++) {
00848                 d[ldL2_POS] += 2 * log(fabs(x[j * nrp1]));
00849             }
00850         }
00851     } else {
00852         int *li = (int*)(L->i), *lp = (int*)(L->p), j, p;
00853         double *lx = (double *)(L->x);
00854         
00855         for (j = 0; j < L->n; j++) {
00856             for (p = lp[j]; li[p] != j && p < lp[j + 1]; p++) {};
00857             if (li[p] != j) break; /* what happened to the diagonal element? */
00858             d[ldL2_POS] += log(lx[p] * ((L->is_ll) ? lx[p] : 1.));
00859         }
00860     }
00861     return (d[pwrss_POS] = d[usqr_POS] + d[wrss_POS]);
00862 }
00863 
00875 SEXP mer_update_L(SEXP x)
00876 {
00877     return ScalarReal(update_L(x));
00878 }
00879 
00881 #define CM_MAXITER  300
00882 
00883 #define CM_TOL      1e-10
00884 
00885 #define CM_SMIN     1e-5
00886 
00887 #if 0
00888 static void
00889 PAHGv(double *dest, const int *perm, const CHM_SP A,
00890        const double *sXwt, double *v, int s)
00891 {
00892     int *ai = (int*)(A->i), *ap = (int*)(A->p), j, k,
00893         ns = A->ncol, p, q = A->nrow;
00894     int n = ns/s;
00895     double *ax = (double*)(A->x),
00896         *td = Alloca(q, double),
00897         *ts = Alloca(ns, double);
00898     R_CheckStack();
00899 
00900     for (k = 0; k < s; k++)
00901         for (j = 0; j < n; j++)
00902             ts[j + k * n] = sXwt[j + k * n] * v[j];
00903     AZERO(td, q);
00904     for (j = 0; j < ns; j++) {
00905         for (p = ap[j]; p < ap[j + 1]; p++)
00906             td[ai[p]] += ts[j] * ax[p];
00907     }
00908     if (perm) apply_perm(dest, td, perm, q);
00909 }
00910 #endif
00911     
00921 static int update_u(SEXP x, int verb)
00922 {
00923     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00924     int i, j, n = dims[n_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
00925     double *Cx = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_CxSym),
00926         *sXwt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtXWtSym),
00927         *res = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_residSym)), 
00928         *u = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uSym)),
00929         cfac = ((double)n) / ((double)q), 
00930         crit, pwrss, pwrss_old, step;
00931     double *tmp = Alloca(q, double), *tmp1 = Alloca(q, double),
00932         *uold = Alloca(q, double), one[] = {1,0}, zero[] = {0,0};
00933     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00934     CHM_DN cres = N_AS_CHM_DN(res, n, 1),
00935         ctmp = N_AS_CHM_DN(tmp, q, 1), sol;
00936     CHM_SP C = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_CmSym));
00937     R_CheckStack();
00938     
00939     if (!(L->is_ll)) error(_("L must be LL', not LDL'"));
00940     if (q > n) error(_("q = %d > n = %d"), q, n);
00941     if (!sXwt) error(_("sqrtXWt slot is empty in update_u"));
00942     if (Cx) {               /* A and C have the same structure */
00943         C = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ASym));
00944         R_CheckStack();
00945         C->x = (void*)Cx;
00946     }
00947     
00948     /* resetting u to zero at the beginning of each evaluation
00949      * requires more iterations but is necessary to obtain a
00950      * repeatable evaluation.  If this is not done the optimization
00951      * algorithm can take wild steps. */
00952     AZERO(u, q);
00953     update_mu(x);
00954     for (i = 0; ; i++) {
00955         
00956         Memcpy(uold, u, q);
00957         pwrss_old = update_L(x);
00958                                 /* tmp := PC %*% wtdResid */
00959         M_cholmod_sdmult(C, 0 /* notrans */, one, zero, cres, ctmp, &c);
00960         Memcpy(tmp1, tmp, q);
00961         apply_perm(tmp, tmp1, (int*)L->Perm, q);
00962                                 /* tmp := tmp - u */
00963         for (j = 0; j < q; j++) tmp[j] -= u[j];
00964                                 /* solve L %*% sol = tmp */
00965         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, ctmp, &c)))
00966             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_L) failed"));
00967         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), q);
00968         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
00969                                 /* evaluate convergence criterion */
00970         crit = cfac * sqr_length(tmp, q) / pwrss_old;
00971         if (crit < CM_TOL) break; /* don't do needless evaluations */
00972                                 /* solve t(L) %*% sol = tmp */
00973         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, ctmp, &c)))
00974             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_Lt) failed"));
00975         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), q);
00976         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
00977 
00978         for (step = 1; step > CM_SMIN; step /= 2) { /* step halving */
00979             for (j = 0; j < q; j++) u[j] = uold[j] + step * tmp[j];
00980             pwrss = update_mu(x);
00981             if (verb < 0)
00982                 Rprintf("%2d,%8.6f,%12.4g: %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g\n",
00983                         i, step, crit, pwrss, pwrss_old, u[1], u[2]);
00984             if (pwrss < pwrss_old) {
00985                 pwrss_old = pwrss;
00986                 break;
00987             }
00988         }
00989         if (step <= CM_SMIN || i > CM_MAXITER) return 0;
00990     }
00991     return i;
00992 }
00993 
01005 SEXP mer_update_u(SEXP x, SEXP verbP)
01006 {
01007     return ScalarInteger(update_u(x, asInteger(verbP)));
01008 }
01009 
01018 static R_INLINE double y_log_y(double y, double mu)
01019 {
01020     return (y) ? (y * log(y/mu)) : 0;
01021 }
01022 
01030 SEXP mer_update_dev(SEXP x)
01031 {
01032     double *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym));
01033     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
01034     int i, n = dims[n_POS];
01035 
01036     d[disc_POS] = d[wrss_POS];
01037     if (LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muEtaSym))) { /* generalized */
01038         SEXP pwtp = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_priorWtSym);
01039         int pw = LENGTH(pwtp);
01040         double *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
01041             *mu = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muSym)),
01042             *wts = REAL(pwtp),
01043             *y = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym));
01044 
01045         d[disc_POS] = 0;
01046         switch(dims[fTyp_POS]) {
01047         case 1:               /* binomial with logit or probit link */
01048         case 2:
01049             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
01050                 double mui = mu[i], yi = y[i];
01051                 d[disc_POS] += 2 * (pw ? wts[i] : 1) *
01052                     (y_log_y(yi, mui) + y_log_y(1 - yi, 1 - mui));
01053             }
01054             break;
01055         case 3:                 /* Poisson with log link */
01056             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
01057                 double mui = mu[i], yi = y[i];
01058                 d[disc_POS] += 2 * (pw ? wts[i] : 1) *
01059                     (y_log_y(yi, mui) - (yi - mui));
01060             }
01061             break;
01062         default:
01063             error(_("General form of glmer_dev_resids not yet written"));
01064         }
01065     }
01066 
01067     d[ML_POS] = d[disc_POS] + d[ldL2_POS] + d[usqr_POS];
01068     return R_NilValue;
01069 }
01070 
01081 SEXP mer_update_ranef(SEXP x)
01082 {
01083     update_ranef(x);
01084     return R_NilValue;
01085 }
01086 
01097 SEXP mer_create_A(SEXP Zt, SEXP ST, SEXP GpP)
01098 {
01099     SEXP ans;
01100     int *Gp = INTEGER(GpP), *nnz, *nz, *vi, *vp, *zdims, *zi, *zp,
01101         Vnnz, ZtOK, j, nf = LENGTH(ST);
01102     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
01103     R_CheckStack();
01104 
01105                                 /* Trivial case, all nc == 1 */
01106     if (ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, (double**)NULL, nc, nlev) <= 1)
01107         return duplicate(Zt);
01108                                 /* Check the nonzero pattern in Zt */
01109     zdims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_DimSym));
01110     nnz = Alloca(zdims[1], int);
01111     nz = Alloca(zdims[0], int);
01112     R_CheckStack();
01113 
01114     zi = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_iSym));
01115     zp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_pSym));
01116     for (j = 0, ZtOK = 1; j < zdims[1]; j++) {
01117         nnz[j] = C_nz_col(nz, j, nf, Gp, nc, nlev, zi, zp);
01118         if (nnz[j] != (zp[j + 1] - zp[j])) ZtOK = 0;
01119     }
01120     if (ZtOK) return duplicate(Zt);
01121                                 /* Must create a new dgCMatrix object */ 
01122     ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("dgCMatrix")));
01123     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_DimSym, duplicate(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_DimSym)));
01124     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_DimNamesSym, allocVector(VECSXP, 2));
01125                                 /* create and populate the p slot */
01126     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_pSym, allocVector(INTSXP, zdims[1] + 1));
01127     vp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_pSym));
01128     vp[0] = 0;
01129     for (j = 0; j < zdims[1]; j++) vp[j + 1] = vp[j] + nnz[j];
01130     Vnnz = vp[zdims[1]];
01131                                 /* create and populate the i slot */
01132     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_iSym, allocVector(INTSXP, Vnnz));
01133     vi = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_iSym));
01134     for (j = 0; j < zdims[1]; j++) {
01135         int i, pos = vp[j];
01136         C_nz_col(nz, j, nf, Gp, nc, nlev, zi, zp);
01137         for (i = 0; i < zdims[0]; i++) if (nz[i]) vi[pos++] = i;
01138     }
01139                                 /* create and zero the x slot */
01140     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_xSym, allocVector(REALSXP, Vnnz));
01141     AZERO(REAL(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_xSym)), Vnnz);
01142 
01143     UNPROTECT(1); 
01144     return ans;
01145 }

01147 #if 0

01159 static R_INLINE double
01160 weight_x(double* dest, const double* src, const double *wt,
01161          int n, int s)
01162 {
01163     int i, k;
01164     double ans = 0;
01165     
01166     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
01167         double accum = 0;
01168         for (k = 0; k < s; k++) {
01169             int ii = i + k * n;
01170             accum += wt[ii] * src[ii];
01171         }
01172         ans += accum * accum;
01173         dest[i] = accum;
01174     }
01175     return ans;
01176 }
01177 #endif
01178 
01189 static void
01190 P_sdmult(double *dest, const int *perm, const CHM_SP A,
01191          const double *X, int nc)
01192 {
01193     int *ai = (int*)(A->i), *ap = (int*)(A->p), m = A->nrow, n = A->ncol;
01194     double *ax = (double*)(A->x), *tmp = Alloca(m, double);
01195     R_CheckStack();
01196 
01197     for (int k = 0; k < nc; k++) {
01198         AZERO(tmp, m);
01199         for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
01200             for (int p = ap[j]; p < ap[j + 1]; p++)
01201                 tmp[ai[p]] += X[j + k * n] * ax[p];
01202         }
01203         apply_perm(dest + k * m, tmp, perm, m);
01204     }
01205 }
01206         
01215 static double update_RX(SEXP x)
01216 {
01217     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym)), *perm;
01218     int i, i1 = 1, j, k, n = dims[n_POS];
01219     int p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS], s = dims[s_POS];
01220     double *X = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_XSym)),
01221         *cx = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_CxSym),
01222         *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)), *fixef,
01223         *rzxy, *rxy = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RXySym)),
01224         *sXwt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtXWtSym), *u,
01225         *y = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym)),
01226         dn = (double) n, dnmp = (double) (n - p),
01227         mone[] = {-1,0}, one[] = {1,0}, zero[] = {0,0};
01228     CHM_SP A = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ASym));
01229     CHM_DN cRCXy = AS_CHM_DN(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RCXySym)), ans, cu;
01230     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01231     R_CheckStack();
01232 
01233     rzxy = (double*)cRCXy->x;
01234     perm = (int*)L->Perm;
01235     if (sXwt) {                 /* Create W^{1/2}GHX in WX */
01236         double *WX = Calloc(n * p, double);
01237 
01238         AZERO(WX, n * p);
01239         for (j = 0; j < p; j++)
01240             for (k = 0; k < s; k++)
01241                 for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
01242                     WX[i + j * n] +=
01243                         sXwt[i + k * n] * X[i + n * (k + j * s)];
01244         if (cx) A->x = (void*)cx;
01245         else {                  /* Replace A by C */
01246             A = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_CmSym));
01247             R_CheckStack();
01248         }
01249         X = WX;
01250     }
01251                                 /* initialize RZX to PAX */
01252     P_sdmult(rzxy, perm, A, X, p);
01253                                 /* initialize RX to X'X */
01254     F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &p, &n, one, X, &n, zero, rxy, &p);
01255                                 /* solve L %*% ans = PAW^{1/2}[X:y] */
01256     ans = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, cRCXy, &c);
01257     Memcpy(rzxy, (double*)(ans->x), q * p);
01258     M_cholmod_free_dense(&ans, &c);
01259                                 /* downdate X'X and factor  */
01260     F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &p, &q, mone, rzxy, &q, one, rxy, &p);
01261     F77_CALL(dpotrf)("U", &p, rxy, &p, &j);
01262     if (j)
01263         error(_("Downdated X'X is not positive definite, %d."), j);
01264                                 /* accumulate log(det(RX)^2)  */
01265     for (j = 0, d[ldRX2_POS] = 0; j < p; j++)
01266         d[ldRX2_POS] += 2 * log(rxy[j * (p + 1)]);
01267 
01268     if (SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_vSym) || SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_muEtaSym)) {
01269         Free(X);
01270         return d[ML_POS];
01271     }
01272                                 /* linear mixed models only */
01273     fixef = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym));
01274     u = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uSym));
01275     cu = N_AS_CHM_DN(u, q, 1);
01276     R_CheckStack();
01277                                 /* solve L del1 = PAy */
01278     if (sXwt) {
01279         double *tmp = Calloc(n, double);
01280         for (i = 0; i < n; i++) tmp[i] = sXwt[i] * y[i];
01281         y = tmp;
01282     }
01283     P_sdmult(u, perm, A, y, 1);
01284     ans = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, cu, &c);
01285     Memcpy(u, (double*)ans->x, q);
01286     M_cholmod_free_dense(&ans, &c);
01287                                 /* solve RX' del2 = X'y - RZX'del1 */
01288     F77_CALL(dgemv)("T", &n, &p, one, X, &n, y, &i1, zero, fixef, &i1);
01289     F77_CALL(dgemv)("T", &q, &p, mone, rzxy, &q,
01290                     u, &i1, one, fixef, &i1);
01291     F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "T", "N", &p, rxy, &p, fixef, &i1);
01292     d[pwrss_POS] = sqr_length(y, n);
01293     d[pwrss_POS] -= sqr_length(fixef, p);
01294     d[pwrss_POS] -= sqr_length(u, q);
01295     if (d[pwrss_POS] < 0)
01296         error(_("Calculated PWRSS for a LMM is negative"));
01297     d[ML_POS] = d[ldL2_POS] +
01298         dn * (1 + log(d[pwrss_POS]) + log(2 * PI / dn));
01299     d[REML_POS] = d[ldL2_POS] + d[ldRX2_POS] +
01300         dnmp * (1. + log(d[pwrss_POS]) + log(2. * PI / dnmp));
01301 
01302     if (sXwt) Free(y);
01303     return d[dims[isREML_POS] ? REML_POS : ML_POS];
01304 }
01305 
01313 SEXP
01314 mer_update_RX(SEXP x)
01315 {
01316     return ScalarReal(update_RX(x));
01317 }
01318 
01328 SEXP 
01329 mer_optimize(SEXP x, SEXP verbp)
01330 {
01331     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
01332     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym)),
01333         i, j, pos, verb = asInteger(verbp);
01334     int lmm = !(LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muEtaSym)) ||
01335                 LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym))),
01336         nf = dims[nf_POS];
01337 /* FIXME: need to add 1 to nv for GLMM with a scale par (maybe).
01338  * Not really but we do need to profile out the scale parameter when
01339  * useSc is TRUE. */
01340     int nv = dims[np_POS] + (lmm ? 0 : dims[p_POS]);
01341     int liv = S_iv_length(OPT, nv), lv = S_v_length(OPT, nv);
01342     double *g = (double*)NULL, *h = (double*)NULL, fx = R_PosInf;
01343     double *fixef = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym));
01344     int *iv = Alloca(liv, int);
01345     double *b = Alloca(2 * nv, double), *d = Alloca(nv, double),
01346         *v = Alloca(lv, double), *xv = Alloca(nv, double);
01347     R_CheckStack();
01348 
01349     ST_getPars(x, xv);
01350     if (!lmm) {
01351         double eta = 1.e-5; /* estimated rel. error on computed lpdisc */
01352 
01353         Memcpy(xv + dims[np_POS], fixef, dims[p_POS]);
01354         v[31] = eta;            /* RFCTOL */
01355         v[36] = eta;            /* SCTOL */
01356         v[41] = eta;            /* ETA0 */
01357     }
01358                                 /* initialize the state vectors v and iv */
01359     S_Rf_divset(OPT, iv, liv, lv, v);
01360     if (verb) iv[OUTLEV] = 1;
01361                                 /* set the bounds to plus/minus Infty  */
01362     for (i = 0; i < nv; i++) {
01363         b[2*i] = R_NegInf; b[2*i+1] = R_PosInf; d[i] = 1;
01364     }
01365                                 /* reset lower bounds on elements of theta_S */
01366     for (i = 0, pos = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01367         int nc = *INTEGER(getAttrib(VECTOR_ELT(ST, i), R_DimSymbol));
01368         for (j = 0; j < nc; j++) b[pos + 2*j] = 0;
01369         pos += nc * (nc + 1);
01370     }
01371     do {
01372         ST_setPars(x, xv);              /* update ST and C */
01373 /* FIXME: Change this so that update_dev is always called and that
01374  * function does the selection of methods based on lmm. The Memcpy
01375  * call should always be used but the number of values to copy can be
01376  * zero. */
01377         if (lmm) {
01378             update_L(x);
01379             fx = update_RX(x);
01380         } else {
01381             
01382             Memcpy(fixef, xv + dims[np_POS], dims[p_POS]);
01383             update_u(x, verb);
01384             mer_update_dev(x);
01385             fx = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym))[ML_POS];
01386         }
01387         S_nlminb_iterate(b, d, fx, g, h, iv, liv, lv, nv, v, xv);
01388     } while (iv[0] == 1 || iv[0] == 2);
01389     update_RX(x);
01390     dims[cvg_POS] = iv[0];
01391     return R_NilValue;
01392 }
01393 
01394 /* Functions for sampling from a Wishart distribution */
01395 /* FIXME: Move these to the R sources */
01396 
01409 static double
01410 *std_rWishart_factor(double df, int p, int upper, double ans[])
01411 {
01412     int i, j, pp1 = p + 1;
01413 
01414     if (df < (double) p || p <= 0)
01415         error("inconsistent degrees of freedom and dimension");
01416     for (j = 0; j < p; j++) {   /* jth column */
01417         ans[j * pp1] = sqrt(rchisq(df - (double) j));
01418         for (i = 0; i < j; i++) {
01419             int uind = i + j * p, /* upper triangle index */
01420                 lind = j + i * p; /* lower triangle index */
01421             ans[(upper ? uind : lind)] = norm_rand();
01422             ans[(upper ? lind : uind)] = 0;
01423         }
01424     }
01425     return ans;
01426 }
01427 
01437 SEXP
01438 lme4_rWishart(SEXP ns, SEXP dfp, SEXP scal)
01439 {
01440     SEXP ans;
01441     int *dims = INTEGER(getAttrib(scal, R_DimSymbol)), i, j, k,
01442         n = asInteger(ns), psqr;
01443     double *scCp, *ansp, *tmp, df = asReal(dfp), one = 1, zero = 0;
01444 
01445     if (!isMatrix(scal) || !isReal(scal) || dims[0] != dims[1])
01446         error("scal must be a square, real matrix");
01447     if (n <= 0) n = 1;
01448     psqr = dims[0] * dims[0];
01449     tmp = Alloca(psqr, double);
01450     scCp = Alloca(psqr, double);
01451     R_CheckStack();
01452 
01453     Memcpy(scCp, REAL(scal), psqr);
01454     AZERO(tmp, psqr);
01455     F77_CALL(dpotrf)("U", &(dims[0]), scCp, &(dims[0]), &j);
01456     if (j)
01457         error("scal matrix is not positive-definite");
01458     PROTECT(ans = alloc3DArray(REALSXP, dims[0], dims[0], n));
01459     ansp = REAL(ans);
01460     GetRNGstate();
01461     for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
01462         double *ansj = ansp + j * psqr;
01463         std_rWishart_factor(df, dims[0], 1, tmp);
01464         F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "U", "N", "N", dims, dims,
01465                         &one, scCp, dims, tmp, dims);
01466         F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &(dims[1]), &(dims[1]),
01467                         &one, tmp, &(dims[1]),
01468                         &zero, ansj, &(dims[1]));
01469 
01470         for (i = 1; i < dims[0]; i++)
01471             for (k = 0; k < i; k++)
01472                 ansj[i + k * dims[0]] = ansj[k + i * dims[0]];
01473     }
01474 
01475     PutRNGstate();
01476     UNPROTECT(1);
01477     return ans;
01478 }
01479 
01480 /* MCMC sampling functions */
01481 
01489 static void MCMC_beta(SEXP x, double sigma)
01490 {
01491     SEXP fixefP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym),
01492         uvecP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uSym);
01493     int i1 = 1, j, p = LENGTH(fixefP), q = LENGTH(uvecP);
01494     int pp1 = p + 1;
01495     double *fix = REAL(fixefP), *uv = REAL(uvecP), mone = -1, one = 1;
01496     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01497     double *del1 = Alloca(q, double), *del2 = Alloca(p, double);
01498     CHM_DN sol, rhs = N_AS_CHM_DN(del1, q, 1);
01499     R_CheckStack();
01500 
01501     update_ranef(x);
01502                                 /* Update the fixed effects */
01503     for (j = 0; j < p; j++) del2[j] = sigma * norm_rand();
01504     F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "N", "N", &p, REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RXySym)),
01505                     &pp1, del2, &i1);
01506     for (j = 0; j < p; j++) fix[j] += del2[j];
01507                                 /* Update the orthogonal random effects */
01508     for (j = 0; j < q; j++) del1[j] = sigma * norm_rand();
01509     F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &q, &p, &mone, REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RCXySym)),
01510                     &q, del2, &i1, &one, del1, &i1);
01511     sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, rhs, &c);
01512     for (j = 0; j < q; j++) uv[j] += ((double*)(sol->x))[j];
01513     M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01514                                 /* Update the random effects */
01515     update_ranef(x);
01516 }
01517 
01526 static void MCMC_u(SEXP x, double sigma)
01527 {
01528 }
01529 
01530 static void
01531 safe_pd_matrix(double x[], const char uplo[], int n, double thresh)
01532 {
01533     int info, lwork = 3 * n, nm1 = n - 1;
01534     double *work = Alloca(3 * n, double),
01535         *w = Alloca(n, double),
01536         *xcp = Memcpy(Alloca(n * n, double), x, n * n);
01537 
01538     F77_CALL(dsyev)("N", uplo, &n, xcp, &n, w, work, &lwork, &info);
01539     if (info) error(_("dsyev returned %d"), info);
01540     if (w[nm1] <= 0) error(_("no positive eigenvalues!"));
01541     if ((w[0]/w[nm1]) < thresh) {
01542         int i, np1 = n + 1;
01543         double incr = w[nm1] * thresh;
01544         for (i = 0; i < n; i++) x[i * np1] += incr;
01545     }
01546 }
01547 
01548 static void MCMC_ST(SEXP x, double sigma, double *vals, int trans)
01549 {
01550     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
01551     int i, info, j, k, ncmax, nf = LENGTH(ST),
01552         *Gp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym));
01553     double *rr = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ranefSym)),
01554         *scal, *var, *wfac, one = 1, zero = 0;
01555     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
01556     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
01557     R_CheckStack();
01558 
01559     ncmax = ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
01560     scal = Alloca(ncmax * ncmax, double);
01561     wfac = Alloca(ncmax * ncmax, double);
01562     var = Alloca(ncmax * ncmax, double);
01563     R_CheckStack();
01564     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01565         int nci = nc[i], nl = nlev[i];
01566         int ncisq = nci * nci, ncip1 = nci + 1;
01567         
01568         AZERO(scal, ncisq);
01569         F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &nci, &nl, &one, rr + Gp[i], &nl,
01570                         &zero, scal, &nci); 
01571         if (nci == 1) *scal = sqrt(*scal);
01572         else {
01573             safe_pd_matrix(scal, "L", nci, 1e-7);
01574             F77_CALL(dpotrf)("U", &nci, scal, &nci, &info);
01575             if (info)
01576                 error(_("scal matrix is not pd after safe_pd_matrix!"));
01577         }
01578                                 /* generate random factor from std Wishart */
01579         AZERO(wfac, ncisq);
01580         std_rWishart_factor((double) (nl - nci + 1), nci, 1, wfac);
01581                                 /* form and store variance-covariance matrix */
01582         F77_CALL(dtrsm)("L", "U", "T", "N", &nci, &nci,
01583                         &one, wfac, &nci, scal, &nci);
01584         F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &nci, &nci, &one, scal, &nci,
01585                         &zero, var, &nci);
01586         for (j = 0; j < nci; j++) {
01587             *vals++ = (trans ? log(var[j * ncip1]) : var[j * ncip1]);
01588         }
01589         for (j = 1; j < nci; j++) {
01590             for (k = 0; k < j; k++) {
01591                 *vals++ = (trans ? atanh(var[k + j * nci]/
01592                                      sqrt(var[j * ncip1] * var[k * ncip1]))
01593                        : var[k + j * nci]);
01594             }
01595         }
01596         if (nci == 1) {
01597             *st[i] = sqrt(*var)/sigma;
01598         } else {
01599             double *sti = st[i];
01600 
01601             for (j = 0; j < nci; j++) /* copy var to st[i] transposing */
01602                 for (k = j; k < nci; k++)
01603                     sti[k + j * nci] = var[j + k * nci];
01604                                 /* factor the variance-covariance matrix */
01605             F77_CALL(dpotrf)("L", &nci, sti, &nci, &info);
01606             if (info)
01607                 error(_("new var-cov matrix is not positive definite!"));
01608             for (j = 0; j < nci; j++) { /* convert to LDL' then TSST' */
01609                 for (k = j + 1; k < nci; k++)
01610                     sti[k + j * nci] /= sti[j * ncip1];
01611                 sti[j * ncip1] /= sigma;
01612             }
01613         }
01614     }
01615 }
01616 
01626 static R_INLINE double MCMC_sigma(const int* dims, const double* d)
01627 {
01628     return (dims[useSc_POS] ? sqrt(d[pwrss_POS]/rchisq(RDF(dims))) : 1);
01629 }
01630 
01643 SEXP mer_MCMCsamp(SEXP x, SEXP savebp, SEXP nsampp, SEXP transp,
01644                   SEXP verbosep, SEXP deviancep)
01645 {
01646     SEXP Pars = PROTECT(mer_ST_getPars(x)), ans;
01647     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
01648     int dPOS = dims[REML_POS] ? REML_POS : ML_POS, i, j,
01649         nsamp = asInteger(nsampp),
01650         p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS],
01651         saveb = asLogical(savebp), trans = asLogical(transp),
01652         verbose = asLogical(verbosep), dev = asLogical(deviancep);
01653     double *ansp, *deviance = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
01654         *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
01655         *fixef = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym)),
01656         *ranef = (double*)NULL;
01657     int nrbase = p + 1 + dims[np_POS]; /* rows always included */
01658     int nrtot = nrbase + dev + (saveb ? q : 0);
01659 
01660     if (nsamp <= 0) nsamp = 1;
01661     ans = PROTECT(allocMatrix(REALSXP, nrtot, nsamp));
01662     ansp = REAL(ans);
01663     for (i = 0; i < nrtot * nsamp; i++) ansp[i] = NA_REAL;
01664     GetRNGstate();
01665     if (verbose) Rprintf("%12s %14s\n", "sigma", "deviance");
01666     if (saveb) ranef = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ranefSym));
01667 
01668     for (i = 0; i < nsamp; i++) {
01669         double *col = ansp + i * nrtot, sigma;
01670                                 /* simulate and store new value of sigma */
01671         sigma = MCMC_sigma(dims, d);
01672         col[p] = (trans ? 2 * log(sigma) : sigma * sigma);
01673         update_ranef(x);        /* Conditional estimates of beta, u and b */
01674         MCMC_beta(x, sigma);    /* Update beta */
01675         for (j = 0; j < p; j++) col[j] = fixef[j]; /* Store beta */
01676         MCMC_u(x, sigma);
01677         if (saveb) {                               /* store b */
01678             update_ranef(x);
01679             for (j = 0; j < q; j++) col[nrbase + dev + j] = ranef[j];
01680         }
01681         MCMC_ST(x, sigma, col + p + 1, trans);
01682 /*      lmer_update_dev(x);     */ /* Refactor and evaluate deviance */
01683         /* FIXME: This deviance should be for sigma, beta, b, ST */
01684         if (dev) col[nrbase] = deviance[dPOS]; 
01685         if (verbose) Rprintf("%12.6g %14.8g\n", sigma, deviance[dPOS]);
01686     }
01687     PutRNGstate();
01688                                 /* Restore pars, refactor, etc. */
01689     mer_ST_setPars(x, Pars);
01690 /*     lmer_update_dev(x); */
01691 /*     lmer_update_effects(x); */
01692     UNPROTECT(2);
01693     return ans;
01694 }
01695 
01696 #ifndef BUF_SIZE
01697 
01698 #define BUF_SIZE 127
01699 #endif  
01700 
01714 static int chkDims(char *buf, int nb, SEXP x, SEXP sym, int nr, int nc)
01715 {
01716     SEXP MP = GET_SLOT(x, sym);
01717     int *dm = isMatrix(MP) ? INTEGER(getAttrib(MP, R_DimSymbol)) : (int*) NULL;
01718     if (!dm || !isReal(MP) || dm[0] != nr || dm[1] != nc)
01719         return snprintf(buf, BUF_SIZE,
01720                         _("Slot %s must be a numeric matrix of size %d by %d"),
01721                         CHAR(PRINTNAME(sym)), nr, nc);
01722     return 0;
01723 }
01724 
01737 static int chkLen(char *buf, int nb, SEXP x, SEXP sym, int len, int zerok)
01738 {
01739     int ll;
01740 
01741     if (!(ll = LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, sym))) == len && zerok && !ll)
01742         return snprintf(buf, BUF_SIZE, _("Slot %s must have length %d."),
01743                         CHAR(PRINTNAME(sym)), len);
01744     return 0;
01745 }
01746 
01755 SEXP mer_validate(SEXP x)
01756 {
01757     SEXP GpP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym),
01758         ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym),
01759         devianceP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym),
01760         dimsP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym),
01761         flistP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_flistSym);
01762     int *Gp = INTEGER(GpP), *dd = INTEGER(dimsP);
01763     int i, n = dd[n_POS], nf = dd[nf_POS], nq, p = dd[p_POS],
01764         q = dd[q_POS], s = dd[s_POS];
01765     int nv = n * s;
01766     CHM_SP Zt = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ZtSym)),
01767         A =  AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ASym));
01768     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01769     char *buf = Alloca(BUF_SIZE + 1, char);
01770     R_CheckStack();
01771                                 /* check lengths */
01772     if (nf < 1 || LENGTH(flistP) != nf || LENGTH(ST) != nf)
01773         return mkString(_("Slots ST, and flist must have length dims['nf']"));
01774     if (LENGTH(GpP) != nf + 1)
01775         return mkString(_("Slot Gp must have length dims['nf'] + 1"));
01776     if (Gp[0] != 0 || Gp[nf] != q)
01777         return mkString(_("Gp[1] != 0 or Gp[dims['nf'] + 1] != dims['q']"));
01778     if (LENGTH(devianceP) != (wrss_POS + 1) ||
01779         LENGTH(getAttrib(devianceP, R_NamesSymbol)) != (wrss_POS + 1))
01780         return mkString(_("deviance slot not named or incorrect length"));
01781     if (LENGTH(dimsP) != (cvg_POS + 1) ||
01782         LENGTH(getAttrib(dimsP, R_NamesSymbol)) != (cvg_POS + 1))
01783         return mkString(_("dims slot not named or incorrect length"));
01784     if (L->n != q || !L->is_ll || !L->is_monotonic)
01785         return mkString(_("Slot L must be a monotonic LL' factorization of size dims['q']"));
01786     if (Zt->nrow != q || Zt->ncol != nv)
01787         return mkString(_("Slot Zt must by dims['q']  by dims['n']*dims['s']"));
01788     if (A->nrow != q || A->ncol != nv)
01789         return mkString(_("Slot A must be dims['q']  by dims['n']*dims['s']"));
01790     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_etaSym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01791     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_fixefSym, p, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01792     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_muEtaSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01793     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_muSym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01794     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_offsetSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01795     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_priorWtSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01796     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_ranefSym, q, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01797     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_residSym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01798     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_sqrtrWtSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01799     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_uSym, q, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01800     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_vSym, nv, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01801     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_varSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01802     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_ySym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01803     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_XSym, nv, p)) return(mkString(buf));
01804     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_RCXySym, q, p)) return(mkString(buf));
01805     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_RXySym, p, p)) return(mkString(buf));
01806 
01807     nq = 0;
01808     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01809         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i), fli = VECTOR_ELT(flistP, i);
01810         int *dm = INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol));
01811         if (!isMatrix(STi) || !isReal(STi) || dm[0] != dm[1])
01812             return
01813                 mkString(_("Slot ST must be a list of square numeric matrices"));
01814         if (Gp[i] > Gp[i + 1])
01815             return mkString(_("Gp must be non-decreasing"));
01816         if (!isFactor(fli))
01817             return mkString(_("flist must be a list of factors"));
01818         nq += dm[0] * LENGTH(getAttrib(fli, R_LevelsSymbol));
01819     }
01820     if (q != nq)
01821         return mkString(_("q is not sum of columns by levels"));
01822     return ScalarLogical(1);
01823 }
01824 
01825 /* Functions for the pedigree class */
01826 
01836 SEXP pedigree_chol(SEXP x, SEXP ans)
01837 {
01838     SEXP Sire = GET_SLOT(x, install("sire"));
01839     int *ai = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_iSym)),
01840         *ap = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_pSym)),
01841         *dam = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("dam"))),
01842         *sire = INTEGER(Sire), 
01843         i, j, n = LENGTH(Sire);
01844     double *ax = REAL(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_xSym)), *F, Di, tmp;
01845 
01846     setAttrib(ans, install("F"), allocVector(REALSXP, n));
01847     F = REAL(getAttrib(ans, install("F")));
01848     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
01849         int k, p = sire[i] - 1, q = dam[i] - 1;
01850         if (sire[i] == NA_INTEGER) {
01851             F[i] = 0;
01852             Di = (dam[i] == NA_INTEGER) ? 1 : sqrt(0.75 - 0.25 * F[q]);
01853         } else {
01854             if (dam[i] == NA_INTEGER) { /* sire only */
01855                 F[i] = 0;
01856                 Di = sqrt(0.75 - 0.25 * F[p]);
01857             } else {            /* both parents in pedigree */
01858                 Di = sqrt(0.5 - 0.25 * (F[p] + F[q]));
01859                 F[i] = NA_REAL;
01860                 if ((ap[i + 1] - ap[i]) > 1) {    /* skip if no progeny */
01861                     if (p > q) {j = p; p = q; q = j;} /* ensure p <= q */
01862                     for (j = 0, F[i] = 0; j <= p; j++) {
01863                         for (k = ap[j], tmp = 0;
01864                              k < ap[j + 1] && ai[k] <= q; k++) {
01865                             int ii = ai[k];
01866                             if (ii == p) tmp = ax[k];
01867                             if (ii == q) F[i] += tmp * ax[k]/2;
01868                         }
01869                     }
01870                 }
01871             }
01872         }
01873         for (j = ap[i]; j < ap[i + 1]; j++) ax[j] *= Di;
01874     }
01875     return ans;
01876 }
01877 
01878 /* NOTE: This function requires that missing parents be coded as zero */
01891 SEXP pedigree_inbreeding(SEXP x)
01892 {
01893     SEXP ans, sp = GET_SLOT(x, install("sire"));
01894     int i, j, t, n = LENGTH(sp), S, D;
01895     int *SI, *MI,               /* start and minor */
01896         *sire = INTEGER(sp),
01897         *dam = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("dam")));
01898     double *F = Alloca(n + 1, double), /* inbreeding coefficients */
01899       *L = Alloca(n + 1, double), *B = Alloca(n + 1, double);
01900     int *Anc = Alloca(n + 1, int),      /* ancestor */
01901         *LAP = Alloca(n + 1, int);      /* longest ancestoral path */
01902     R_CheckStack();
01903     
01904     F[0] =-1; LAP[0] =-1; /* set F and lap for unknown parents */
01905     for(i = 1, t = -1; i <= n; i++) {   /* evaluate LAP and its maximum */
01906         S = sire[i]; D = dam[i]; /* parents of animal i */
01907         LAP[i] = ((LAP[S] < LAP[D]) ? LAP[D] : LAP[S]) + 1;
01908         if (LAP[i] > t) t = LAP[i];
01909     }
01910     SI = Alloca(t + 1, int);
01911     MI = Alloca(t + 1, int);
01912     for(i = 0; i <= t ; ++i) SI[i] = MI[i] = 0; /* initialize start and minor */
01913     for(i = 1; i <= n; i++) {   /* evaluate F */
01914         S = sire[i]; D = dam[i]; /* parents of animal i */
01915         B[i] = 0.5 - 0.25 * (F[S] + F[D]); 
01916                                 /* adjust start and minor */
01917         for (j = 0; j < LAP[i]; j++) {++SI[j]; ++MI[j];} 
01918         if (S == 0 || D == 0) { /* both parents unknown */
01919             F[i] = L[i] = 0; continue;
01920         }
01921         if(S == sire[i-1] && D == dam[i-1]) { /* full-sib with last animal */
01922             F[i] = F[i-1]; L[i] = L[i-1]; continue;
01923         }
01924     
01925         F[i] = -1; L[i] = 1; 
01926         t = LAP[i]; /* largest lap group number in the animal's pedigree */
01927         Anc[MI[t]++] = i; /* initialize Anc and increment MI[t] */
01928         while(t > -1) { /* from the largest lap group to zero */
01929             j = Anc[--MI[t]]; /* next ancestor */
01930             S = sire[j]; D = dam[j]; /* parents of the ancestor */
01931             if (S) {
01932                 if (!L[S]) Anc[MI[LAP[S]]++] = S; 
01933                                 /* add sire in its lap group in Anc
01934                                  * array if it is not added yet and
01935                                  * increment the minor index for the group */ 
01936                 L[S] += 0.5 * L[j]; /* contribution to sire */
01937             }
01938             if (D) {
01939                 if (!L[D]) Anc[MI[LAP[D]]++] = D;
01940                 L[D] += 0.5 * L[j]; /* contribution to dam */
01941             }
01942             F[i] += L[j] * L[j] * B[j];
01943             L[j] = 0; /*clear L[j] for the evaluation of the next animal */
01944             if (MI[t] == SI[t]) --t; /* move to the next lap group when
01945                                       * all ancestors in group t have been
01946                                       * evaluated */
01947         } 
01948     }
01949     ans = PROTECT(allocVector(REALSXP, n));
01950     Memcpy(REAL(ans), F + 1, n);
01951     UNPROTECT(1);
01952     return ans;
01953 }
